name: Quantum Communicator
description: A handheld device that uses quantum entanglement for instant, lag-free communication across any distance in the universe.

name: Holo-Projector 3000
description: Portable holographic projector capable of rendering 8K 3D environments in mid-air without a screen.

name: Neural Link Headset
description: Non-invasive headset that monitors brain activity and provides real-time stress relief through sonic waves.

name: Gravity Boots
description: Footwear containing micro-thrusters that allow the wearer to hover and glide over rough terrain.

name: Smart Fabric Suit
description: Clothing made of adaptive nanomaterials that change color and thermal properties based on the wearer's environment.

name: Aqua-Breather Mask
description: Compact face mask that extracts oxygen directly from water, allowing unlimited underwater breathing.

name: Solar Skin Patch
description: A thin, adhesive patch that absorbs solar energy and wirelessly charges personal electronic devices.

name: Universal Translator Earbud
description: In-ear device that translates over 5000 languages and dialects in real-time with 99% accuracy.

name: Nano-Repair Kit
description: A canister of nanobots programmed to repair cracks and damage in metal, glass, and plastic surfaces instantly.

name: Time-Lapse Camera
description: Camera that can capture events from the past by analyzing residual light photons in the environment (experimental).

name: Levitation Desk
description: Work desk that floats at adjustable heights and includes a built-in holographic display surface.

name: Nutri-Synth Chef
description: Kitchen appliance that synthesizes gourmet meals from basic nutrient cartridges in under 3 minutes.

name: Atmosphere Generator
description: Device that purifies air and generates custom scents and humidity levels for the perfect home environment.

name: Memory Crystal
description: Data storage medium capable of holding 100 petabytes of data in a crystal the size of a thumb drive.

name: Exo-Glove
description: Power-assist glove that increases grip strength by 500%, ideal for heavy lifting and construction work.

name: Dream Recorder
description: Bedside device that monitors REM sleep and records dreams for playback on holographic screens.

name: Teleportation Pad (Mini)
description: Short-range teleportation device for transporting small inanimate objects up to 10 meters.

name: Forcefield Umbrella
description: Handle that generates a rain-repelling forcefield dome, keeping the user perfectly dry without fabric.

name: Bio-Luminescent Plant Kit
description: Genetically modified house plants that emit a soft, adjustable glow, replacing the need for electric lamps.

name: AI Personal Assistant Drone
description: Tennis-ball-sized drone that follows you, takes photos, carries keys, and answers questions.
